participant_1.background:
I'm happy that I'm able to help out in my family, and that I got to meet a real unicorn!
Music is my way to relax and enjoy my time with friends.
I wear comfortable clothing so I can feel my best while taking walks.
I'm proud of my new Mercedes Benz.
My teeth hurt from not chewing my food properly, but I have to move my army to the new camp.

participant_2.background:
My favorite holiday is Halloween because it is a time for fun and celebration.
I've been fortunate to have a close-knit family my whole life.
I am a twenty five year old comic book collector.
I want to learn how to let things go and not be so hard on myself.
My cats and I love the rainy weather in Portland!

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing today?
Doing well! I'm excited to meet someone new.
Me too! I'm always up for meeting new people.
What are some of your interests?
I love comic books, video games, and Halloween.
Cool! I like comic books and video games too.
I like a lot of different games, but I'm really into the new God of War right now.
I've heard good things about that game. I've been playing a lot of the new Mario game.
I love Mario games! I've been playing them since I was a kid.
Me too! I'm always excited for new Mario games.
What's your favorite thing about Halloween?
I love the costumes and the decorations. It's just a fun and festive time of year.
Me too! I love dressing up and going to parties.
Me too! I love seeing all the creative costumes people come up with.
I think Halloween is the best holiday.
I agree! It's definitely my favorite.
